about.title: About this site
about.description: A minimal, bilingual, statically-generated personal site designed to showcase my academic journey and tech-driven finance interests.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.description: Welcome to my website. Please feel free to read more about me, or you can check out my resume, projects, view my experiences, or contact me.

intro.en: I am an undergraduate student in SWUFE, enrolled in RIEM with a major in Finance  (minor in Business Administration and the Honors Program in Mathematics). I have a solid background in quantitative strategies and blockchain technologies. I specialize in developing machine learning–based, high-frequency, and market-making strategies and have achieved over 300% returns through discretionary trading in cryptocurrency markets. I am interested in exploring emerging research directions at the intersection of finance, mathematics and computer science.
intro.zh: 我是西南财经大学经管国际实验班（辅修工商管理以及数学荣誉课程）的一名金融专业本科在读生，拥有扎实的量化策略和区块链技术背景。我擅长开发机器学习和高频交易策略以及做市策略，曾通过自主交易实现超过 300% 的收益。我热衷于探索金融、数学、计算机科学交叉融合下的新兴方向。
